Handy amenities include complimentary bottled water, a safe, The private bathroom with a rainfall showerhead. All guest floors are single key access.

Relaxing lounges or one of LlandudnoÂ’s best stocked bars, the choice is yours at The Ambassador.

Our Patisserie is open from 10.00am to 5.30pm daily, where you can relax with a pot of tea or coffee. Spoil yourself with a sandwich made on our home-baked bread, perhaps indulge in a cream cake or afternoon tea.

Our Head Chef and his team provide interesting and varied menus based on local produce. We use local free range eggs and our fish, fruit and vegetables are sourced from local suppliers. Special diets for vegetarians, diabetics, and fat -free diets can also be accommodated with prior notice.
